response: Horrocks-Hopayian was composer-in-residence at Handel House Museum from 2012 to 2014.Cevanne Horrocks-Hopayian handelhendrix.org, accessed 20 December 2020  In February 2016, she launched Handel House Museum's opening of Jimi Hendrix's flat to the public by performing original material in collaboration with Jessica Hynes, bassist Calum Gourlay, guitarist Christopher Montague and artist Maya Ramsay.Welcome home, Hendrix handelhendrix.org, accessed 20 December 2020
